completed: Fix session ID extraction from system.init message
Make Receive() idempotent - return error on second call
worker_notes: Fixed initialize() to continue reading after control_response to capture system.init session_id. Changed Receive() to use mutex guard instead of sync.Once, returning error on second call. Removed unused recvOnce field. All tests pass.
feedback: VERIFIED: All 4 issues fixed. Tests pass with exit code 0. initialize() now continues reading after control_response to capture system.init. Receive() uses persistent recvChan field with mutex guard to prevent double calls. No panics, no failures.
